data.title: I Ought to Be in Pictures Original 1982 U.S. One Sheet Movie Poster
data.meta_description: Original 1982 U.S. one sheet poster for the film I Ought to Be in Pictures directed by Herbert Ross with Walter Matthau / Ann-Margret / Dinah Manoff / Lance Guest.
